public class LoginController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller that handles logIn functionality.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the LoginController which is reponsible for the functionality of the logIn Page. Changes Labels and the alert box between English and French based on the users language settings.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • getLoginAttempt

      public static void getLoginAttempt(String username, boolean success)
      Create's a log string and calls addToLog method to append the log. Appends the username, date and if the log was successful or not.
      Parameters:
      username -
      success -

    • checkUserNameandPasswordHandler

      public void checkUserNameandPasswordHandler(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Determines if the username and password is valid from the Users table. Uses alert box's to display error messages.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent -
      Throws:
